Title: Promotes voter registration and voting by incarcerated people; repealer
Summary: Relates to promoting inmate voter registration and voting by incarcerated people; requires the department of corrections and community supervision to distribute a voter information guide and hold voter information and registration clinics for incarcerated people every other year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law and the correction law, in relation to promoting voter registration and voting by incarcerated people; and to repeal certain provisions of the election law relating thereto
